TopicTitle: Gravity Ring [UPDATE!] - Part 1, Launch & Part 2, Refuelling

Articles.Content:
Hiya,

I was trying to build a gravity ring earlier (old attempt:

), but i found out my pc could not handle anything much larger.

So after upgrading (pc ) parts the past 2 months i decided to try another attempt. Well actually, about 500.... Since the structure is too big to span struts from the ring to the core i had to improvise.

So about 740 parts later, the behemoth gets to orbit, with some to spare

And i tried legit at least 100 times. But i noticed that breakdown-on-launch ratio without mechjeb was 9-1 and with mechjeb it dropped to 4-1

So not that stable in heavy gravity/atmosphere, but works fine once out into space.
